attributes.action: COVID deadly mutations Risk - Keep masks and social distancing measures in place
attributes.additional_details: Incompetent Boris and his Govt. has caused almost 125k+ deaths already due to delayed and incorrect decisions. This decision to relax restrictions on 19 July 2021 will add fuel to the fire and cause a big issue in long run. We will end up bigger lockdown. This madness needs to stop or people will lose loved ones again.
attributes.background:
If Social distancing measures are lifted on 19 July 2021 then
there is genuine concern of further deadly mutations of COVID virus as confirmed by scientists. Vaccines may totally become useless. More people will die and suffer from long COVID effects.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590611

This petition briefly included an incorrect link to a petition that was calling for the opposite action. Apologies for any confusion caused.
